Game.Name: Oh Mummy Genesis (World) (Unl)
Game.plot: Revive the classic 8-bit computer game in a new remake full of surprises. New pyramids have been discovered, but there are fearsome guardians guarding inside. Help the archaeologist Lance Colton and his partner Eve Chou to find all the treasures and get out alive!Cheat: InvincibilityAt the title screen, press A, B, A, C, A, B, B. PRESS START should now instead say OJETEEEEEE when entered correctly.
Game.Notes: Oh Mummy Genesis is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive game developed and published by 1985 Alternativo. It was released in October 2012 and serves as an unofficial update to the game Oh Mummy, originally released by Gem Software for the Amstrad CPC, MSX and ZX Spectrum in 1984. As well as providing a port of the original version, Oh Mummy Genesis features an updated version with enhanced graphics and sound. 1985 Alternativo released the ROM as freeware in 2013, after stocks of boxed copies of the game ran out.
